description:
Library for WPF projects.

* DI (Dependency Injection)
  * Injector: allows to register Types, Instances and values. Inject in services and ViewModels
* Navigation
  * Regions: change and animate the content of ContentRegion (ContentControl) and ItemsRegions (ItemsControl, TabControl, ... and more with Adapters) 
  * ViewModelLocator: allows to resolve ViewModel for a view with AutoWireViewModel
  * WpfNavigationService: allows to navigate with regions, cancel navigation with guards (CanActivate, CanDeactivate) and notify ViewModels with parameters
* Mvvm
  * ViewModelBase implements INavigatable (CanActivate, CanDeactivate, OnNavigatedTo, OnNavigatingFrom) with parameter
  * Observable, Validatable, Editable and ValidateAndEditable base classes for Models and ViewModels
  * Commands and composite command
  * Sync extensions for list and collections. Allows to sync data
  * TypedCache
  * Singleton
* Messenger : allows to subscribe and publish messages
* Services
  * HttpService with interceptors
  * Json Serialization with DataContractJsonSerializer
* Adaptive
  * AdaptiveControl: allows to bind controls and make the page "responsive"
  * AdaptiveBinding
title: WpfLib
